Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory686.jpg'}
{3: "Under the star-painted sky, Constellia stretches out in panoramic splendor as the night breezes soothe the woman's soul.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Atop the tower's terrace, Qu sits quietly, gently turning the porcelain cup in her hand."}
{3: 'With it, the door of the elevator behind Qu opens.'}
{3: 'The Monarch of Kowloong, however, keeps her gaze fixed on the night view before her.'}
{2: 'Been very difficult to see you with everything going on, eh?'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "But nothing is impossible if you actually put in the effort to make it happen, wouldn't you say?", 4: '1'}
{3: "You can't see Qu's expression from where you stand, but you sense a hint of warmth in her voice."}
{3: 'The rooftop terrace is covered with Kowloong-style carpets, upon which sit low wooden tables and plush cushioned seating.'}
{3: 'The table is set with dishes of appetizers, an alcohol pot, and two porcelain cups.'}
{2: 'She actually brought furniture all the way up to the rooftop...', 3: '19'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Come, take a seat here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu taps the table lightly as a gesture for you to sit beside her.'}
{2: '(Sit beside Qu)', 3: '24'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'So I heard there was an event going on in Constellia these days...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Where we can force someone to do a "daring challenge" if they have a voucher...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu brings the porcelain cup to her lips and takes a delicate sip.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Say, you wouldn't happen to have one of those vouchers with you, would you?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Well, you're right on the money.", 3: '34', 4: 'Yeah...', 5: '41'}
{3: 'You take the voucher out of your pocket and place it on the table.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'A clever counter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you in a bad mood?', 3: '38'}
{3: 'Caught off guard by the question, Qu appears momentarily taken aback.'}
{3: 'After a brief pause, she seems ready to explain herself.'}
{3: 'You take the voucher out of your pocket and place it on the table.'}
{3: 'Seeing you so forthcoming, Qu stops teasing you.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It's been a while since you last visited Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Perhaps finding herself a little too direct, she picks up the voucher from the table and studies it as she changes the subject.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Did you bring this voucher here to make me do a daring challenge?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yes, that's exactly what I'm trying to do.", 3: '48', 4: 'I was just casually walking when someone shoved it into my hands.', 5: '48'}
{3: 'Qu tears the voucher into pieces and casts them aside unceremoniously.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "And we're way past the point where you need an excuse like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Just tell me what it is that you want me to do.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I just want to grab a quick bite now.', 3: '55'}

{3: "It was supposed to be your day off today, except you had to deal with an emergency work situation remotely during the day, and then you came across a child who'd gotten separated from their parents..."}
{3: "By the time everything was taken care of, it was already getting dark, and that's when it hit you that you'd completely forgotten to eat."}
{3: 'The dishes on the table, you know, are far from being able to quench your hunger now.'}
{3: 'Qu seems to have seen this coming. Shortly after she finishes sending a message on her terminal, a Kowloong Crew member arrives with food.'}
{2: "Holy, it's Kowloong Bewitching Rice!", 3: '61'}
{3: 'Sitting on top of the steaming white rice are sliced char siu pork, bok choy hearts, and a perfectly fried egg sprinkled with sesame seeds. You can barely contain your excitement.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Thought this would come in handy.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu fills two porcelain cups and raises one.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Have a drink with me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory686.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory686.jpg'}
{3: 'Deep into the night, the human by Qu has fallen asleep on the divan at some point.'}
{3: 'When she notices the frown on your face...'}
{3: 'Qu places your head on her lap to help you sleep better.'}
{3: 'She now lifts her gaze to the countless stars above.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'To each according to their talent, to the able comes a greater burden...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I wonder what you've been through these days.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I know you've been busy. I can always come to you if you can't visit Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With it, Qu's voice melts into the night."}
